collectible.title: Trixies Hat
collectible.subtitle: It's a bit small, and has two large holes in it...
collectible.text:
Thank you so much for playing with Trixie! I hope you enjoyed your time with her, and she brought you a smile!
Trixie is a passion project and my attempt to pour my love of this game into a character who will, hopefully, display that much love. Thank you, dear reader! May your days bring you as much joy as you can carry!

collectible.title: Romance Necklace
collectible.subtitle: Will (soon) unlock romance with Trixie...
collectible.text:
Trixie gave you this necklace as a symbol of her affection to you! Wear this to unlock "Date Night" mode with Trixie! She'll be extra fistey and flirty in this mode.
(Work in Progress, Date Night is not yet implimented! Sorry!)
collectible.unlock: Show Trixie your devotion by taking her to a very romantic rooftop, while wearing her hat. Keep the hat on all game and win with it.
